fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Destructive: Your Hand Size is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaos’ Night phase attack. You may disguise as any role at any point during the game, and this disguise affects up to Susceptible checks.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a Special card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Trick: Play Confound?! a player of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Illusion: Send a host message to any host channel or private player channel. The message will not actually do anything, but players may interact with it as if it were real. (i.e. waste Defense cards on fake attacks, or waste a channel on a fake trade) [Infinite uses, 1 CD, Astral] 
- Pseudocide: Select a player to “die” at the end of the phase. Their HP will appear as 0 minus any damage they took that phase. If they would normally otherwise be alive, they will come back to the game in 2 phases with the HP they had before they “died”. If the game would normally end as if they were actually dead, the game ends when they are “dead”. If you die, your target will still revive. [1 use, Unique, Locks D5]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
